tool.name: Tool

param.name: order_dependencies_file
param.dialogReference: Text Document Input: Location of the order dependency file from the Consolidate Orders script tool.

param.name: solved_stops
param.dialogReference: Table Input: The stops output table from the VRP problem.

param.name: input_routes
param.dialogReference: Input: The routes table or feature class that was used for the VRP problem.

param.name: input_depots
param.dialogReference: Feature Class Input: The depots feature class that was used for the VRP problem.

param.name: stops_location
param.dialogReference: Feature Class Input: The location of the stops saved from the Consolidate Orders script. This should have all the original locations as well found in the original_stops layer.

param.name: network_dataset
param.dialogReference: Network Dataset Input: The input Network Dataset.

param.name: route_data_location
param.dialogReference: Output Folder Location: The output folder location where the final zip will be saved.

tool.summary: This Python Toolbox takes the solved consolidated orders and expands them back out to the individual orders. This allows for a workflow that provides the individual arrival times.

dataIdInfo.idCredit: Code Base Written by the Network Analyst Product Engineering Team. Toolboxes, extended functionality, and rewrites: Yuri Potawsky & Kerri Rasmussen
